alert.note: Alert for Logan County; Phillips County; Sedgwick County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 10 at 1:44PM MDT until May 11 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall will be possible. * WHERE...The northeast plains of Colorado, including Logan County, Phillips County and Sedgwick County. * WHEN...From Thursday morning through late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Moderate to potentially heavy rain at times will lead to an enhanced risk of flash flooding, particularly for areas where soil nears saturation due to antecedent rainfall.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Logan County; Phillips County; Sedgwick County
